name: Goodbye, my Friend
description:
The artwork is a synthesis of emotional stimuli involving friendship and it's relationship with history, society and the individual destiny.

In this work, both stylistic elements linked to AI and compositional elements of a traditional matrix coexist. In this dual representation the inextricable link of friendship is broken by an inevitable relationship of cause and effect.

While navigating through a deep rough sea, magmatic stratification and justaposition of life events and accidents, sometimes in front of the shipwreck of a friend it's possible only to say "Goodbye, my Friend".
